name: Hee Hee: The Game
description:
Description

This Game was developed for a school project, this is the first game we've made, and we're very proud. This game is a tribute to Undertale, which the gameplay and alot of music is based of, Berserk which inspired the theme, Characters and also music, and same thing with the souls series. If ya'll wanna see more dumb stuff, we have a youtube channel (don't expect much) https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCanAXgzBpAs03UE4vj8IMQ

Music : Tobyfox(Undertale Ost), Berserk

Narrator : AI Moistcritikal

How to Play

-If you played Undertale, you know whats going on. 

-W A S D to walk. 

-SPACE to interact, talk, etc.

-E to open Inventory 

-X to use items 

-Dodge the incoming projectiles while fighting, then inflict damage by hitting the bar -Using weapons in fight is a one time thing and can inflict huge amounts of damage

-Don't Die or you will have to start over
